text: Voyagers The Sleeping Abductees Volume I of the Emerald Covenant CDT-Plate Translations Ashayana Deane, (formerly published as Anna Hayes) Published by Wild Flower Press, an imprint of Granite Publishing L.L.C., at Smashwords First Smashwords Edition Information Transcribed from the Guardian Alliance regarding Extraterrestrial Visitation, the Extraterrestrial Agendas, Keylontic Morphogenetic Science, and the Mechanics of Alien Contact. These transcriptions are not derived from channeled sources.
